attributes.action: support the BBC from interference by commercial broadcasters and the BBC Trust
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC is the finest news and entertainment organisation in the whole world. The current structure supported by a license fee ensures its quality and should be maintained. 

There has recently been considerable interference by organisations such as Sky and ITV in defining the BBC agenda, and insufficient support from the BBC Trust and politicians in countering this assault.

We would like the BBC to continue being supported by the license fee and to encourage creativity, the standards of which have for a long time been established by the BBC as the leader in its field.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
